rows.label: bf10390100_0120
rows.name: It will change!

rows.label: bf10390100_0122
rows.name: I will change it!

rows.label: bf10390100_0130
rows.name: That's the reason we've come all this way!

rows.label: bf10390100_0140
rows.name: Why don't you just let it go?!

rows.label: bf10390100_0150
rows.name: Who do you think you're doing this for?!

rows.label: bf10390100_0160
rows.name: I'm doing it...for myself.

rows.label: bf10390100_0170
rows.name: If it helps put smiles on people's faces...

rows.label: bf10390100_0180
rows.name: Helps them live their lives together...

rows.label: bf10390100_0190
rows.name: Then that's my role in this world!

rows.label: bf10390100_0200
rows.name:
Shin told me to take care of
you in his place, you know.

rows.label: bf10390100_0210
rows.name: Shin never wanted to die...

rows.label: bf10390100_0220
rows.name: He just wanted to connect with you!

rows.label: bf10390100_0230
rows.name: He did it because you showed him a path!

rows.label: bf10390100_0240
rows.name: And how many people died because of it?!

rows.label: bf10390100_0250
rows.name: You'd forgive him, just like that?!

rows.label: bf10390100_0260
rows.name: Forgiving isn't that easy.

rows.label: bf10390100_0270
rows.name: But that's just the world we live in!

rows.label: bf10390100_0280
rows.name: We need to find a way forward, within that world!

rows.label: bf10390100_0290
rows.name: [ML:undisp]...

rows.label: bf10390100_0300
rows.name: Even you...

rows.label: bf10390100_0310
rows.name: used to think like that once!
